dt: {bc}a scheming or crafty action or artful design intended to accomplish some usually evil end

dt.t: backstage {wi}machinations{/wi} … that have dominated the film industry

pt: {sc}plot{/sc} {sc}intrigue{/sc} {sc}machination{/sc} {sc}conspiracy{/sc} {sc}cabal{/sc} mean a plan secretly devised to accomplish an evil or treacherous end. {sc}plot{/sc} implies careful foresight in planning a complex scheme.
{sc}intrigue{/sc} suggests secret underhanded maneuvering in an atmosphere of duplicity.
{sc}machination{/sc} implies a contriving of annoyances, injuries, or evils by indirect means.
{sc}conspiracy{/sc} implies a secret agreement among several people usually involving treason or great treachery.
{sc}cabal{/sc} typically applies to political intrigue involving persons of some eminence.

shortdef: a scheming or crafty action or artful design intended to accomplish some usually evil end
